text: Maria Carmela Brosas (born 15 July 1975K Brosas – Biography – IMDb), better known by her screen name K Brosas, is a Filipino actress, comedian, singer and television host. She was born in the Philippines to an American father and a Filipina mother and was a band member of Gladys and the Boxers and was lead singer when the group performed as K and the Boxers. In mid-2010, she became a co-host in the game show Pilipinas Win na Win. ==Filmography== ===Television=== {| class="wikitable" |- ! Year !! Title !! Role !!
